subject: PERO
title: Prac Mgmt Extern
info: Familiarizes periodontal students with the private practice environment and prepares them to select the type of practice they want to purchase or build and successfully manage their office.
prereqInfo: prereq: Resident in advanced education program in periodontology

subject: PERO
title: Perio/Orthodontics Seminar
info: Seminar related to postdoctoral work in periodontics/orthodontics.

subject: PERO
title: Multi. Discip. Seminars
info: Series of multidisciplinary treatment seminars related to specialized fields in periodontology, endodontics, pediatric dentistry, AEGD/GPR, and prosthodontics dentistry.
prereqInfo: prereq: Resident enrolled in [periodontology, endodontics, pediatric dentistry, AEGD/GPR, prosthodontics]

subject: PERO
title: Multi. Discip. Seminars II
info: Series of multidisciplinary treatment seminars related to specialized fields in periodontology, endodontics, pediatric dentistry, AEGD/GPR, and prosthodontics dentistry.
prereqInfo: prereq: Resident enrolled in [periodontology, endodontics, pediatric dentistry, AEGD/GPR, prosthodontics], completion of PERO 7322

subject: PERO
title: Perio Clinic
info: Clinical training in examination, diagnosis, treatment planning, and various phases of prevention and treatment of periodontal diseases in patients.
prereqInfo: prereq: Resident in advanced education program in periodontology

subject: PERO
title: Clinical Seminars
prereqInfo: prereq: Resident in advanced education program in periodontology

subject: PERO
title: Anatomy of the Periodontium
info: Gingival tissues, cementum, periodontal ligament, and alveolar bone discussed from histological, physiological. and pathological point of view.
prereqInfo: prereq: Resident in advanced education program in periodontology

subject: PERO
title: Histology of the Periodontium
info: The goal of this course is to develop in-depth knowledge of the histology of the periodontium. The class format is a weekly seminar in which students must be able to identify and describe unlabeled histological components to the faculty.
